title: Installation​
content: To use Feature Flags, you need to include it as a dependency in yourwally.toml file. Feature Flags can then be installed with Wally. FeatureFlags = "lasttalon/feature-flags@0.1.0"

title: Usage​
content: To use Feature Flags in your project, simply require the module and access the hooks you want to use. For example, to use the ? ?: local FeatureFlags = require(ReplicatedStorage.Packages.MatterHooks)  Refer to the API documentation for a list of available hooks and their parameters.
